meanings.definition: Involving or consisting of multiple phases.
meanings.sent1: The project required a multiphase approach to ensure all aspects were covered.
meanings.sent2: The research team conducted a multiphase study to gather comprehensive data.
meanings.sent3: The multiphase plan to organize the event made everyone's head spin.
meanings.sent4: Her multiphase personality revealed different sides of her character at different times.
meanings.sent5: The multiphase nature of the problem demanded a thorough analysis from all angles.

meanings.sent1: They decided to multiphase the project to manage the workload effectively.
meanings.sent2: The chef needed to multiphase the cooking process to ensure everything was ready on time.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally multiphased my morning routine, ending up rushing to work.
meanings.sent4: The team leader multiphased the task to delegate responsibilities efficiently.
meanings.sent5: She had to multiphase her study schedule to balance work and school commitments.
